meanings.sent1: The multilane highway allowed for smoother traffic flow.
meanings.sent2: The city built a multilane bridge to accommodate the increasing number of cars.
meanings.sent3: The multilane parking lot made finding a spot much easier.
meanings.sent4: Her multilane mind could juggle multiple tasks effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The multilane river split into several smaller streams.

meanings.definition: A road or highway with more than one lane in each direction.
meanings.sent1: We drove on the multilane highway to reach our destination faster.
meanings.sent2: The multilane road was busy with cars heading in different directions.
meanings.sent3: The multilane street resembled a colorful ribbon weaving through the city.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts raced like cars on a multilane highway.
meanings.sent5: The multilane expressway was well-lit and easy to navigate at night.
